title: Commander Keen GMD
content:
i know someone on this board made an game maker commander keen gmd complete with side-scrolling, i was wondering if that person would share that gmd with me, i will give credit to him it would only be fair

if you are that person or have something that is close to the real thing then post

title: Re: Commander Keen GMD
content:
Yet another Game Maker user?!!

I was actually working on a Keen.gmd myself, and was improving some neat things... but it was destroyed with my memory stick, and as of yet, has not been recovered.

I'd really like a .gmd copy!!!

I promise full Credit!!!

Plz!!!

I want to impliment a few things of my own... I love gamemaker!!!
